ja506:9.2: Hatthattamāgacchi → hatthattha māgañchi (bj) | hatthatthamāgacchi (s2, s3) | hatthattham āgañchi (pts1)
ja506:11.1: pañcadasiñca → paṇṇarasiñca (bj) | paṇṇarasiṃ ca (s2, s3) | pannarasiñca (pts1)
ja506:21.2: Saṃvaṭṭaye → saṃvaṭṭayaṃ (bj, pts1) | saṃvatteyya (s2, s3) | saṃvaṭṭeyya (mr)
ja506:21.3: samūlamuppate → ... mubbahe (bj, s2, s3, pts1, Ma-aka) | ... muṭṭhahe (mr)
ja506:23.3: Maṃkāraṇā → mama kāraṇā (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
